original: Dhammapaccanīya (2), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1)🔽7.9. Dassanahetuttika🔽Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi  dassana hetuttika  na dassanena pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca pe na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca pe na neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca
translated: The Triads🔽With root cause that is not to be abandoned by seeing, and with root cause that is to be abandoned by cultivation, and with root cause that is not to be abandoned by seeing or by cultivation. (In brief.)

original: Hetuyā ekatiṁsa, ārammaṇe aṭṭhavīsa, adhipatiyā ekūnatiṁsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekatiṁsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekatisa ārammaṇe aṭṭhavīsa adhipatiyā ekūnatisa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekatisa
